description: This will send a message to an agent that will browse the internet to answer your question. Ask them for all your web-search related questions, but they're unable to do problem-solving. Provide as much context as possible, in particular if you need to search on a specific timeframe! And don't hesitate to provide a complex search task, like finding a difference between two webpages.
A tool that can answer questions about attached images.
A tool that can execute Python code to do calculation and plotting, etc.

A tool that can read a file as markdown text and answer questions about it. This tool handles the following file extensions: [".html", ".htm", ".xlsx", ".pptx", ".wav", ".mp3", ".flac", ".pdf", ".docx"], and all other types of text files. IT DOES NOT HANDLE IMAGES.
